page.title: 12Recreation in Leicester
page.content: The inner city of Leicester offers many{sporting facilities}for its population.{ {Victoria}and{Abbey Parks}at opposite ends of the city offer facilities for passive recreation as well as{Tennis, {Football, Cricket, Basketball}and{ {Rugby. } The city boasts a First Division football team, and a top rate rugby club. The{Tigers}rugby ground is rated as the second best ground in England. {St. Margaret's}baths provides facilities for swimming and diving as well as a health centre, including saunas, weight training and a solarium.{Granby Halls}offers many indoor activities eg{squash}and{roller {skating.} {Allotment gardens}are found between the inner city and the suburbs where land is cheaper.
